description: This Java class implements a WebSocket handler for a chat service, handling connection establishment, message receipt, and connection closure with stub implementations for greeting and acknowledgment messages.

classes.name: ChatWebSocketHandler
classes.description: WebSocket handler for chat interactions, extending TextWebSocketHandler to process connection events and messages.

methods.name: afterConnectionEstablished
methods.description: Handles actions after a new WebSocket connection is established, sends a welcome message.

methods.name: handleTextMessage
methods.description: Processes incoming text messages, currently acknowledging receipt with a stub response.

methods.name: afterConnectionClosed
methods.description: Handles connection closure, currently as a no-op.
